root.name: Battletoads in Battlemaniacs
root.description: Battletoads in Battlemaniacs is the first SNES release of the popular Battletoads series, continuing the trend of ludicrous humor and storylines, coupled with brutal difficulty established by its predecessor, Battletoads. The traditional side-scrolling beat 'em up gameplay mechanics are retained, but with the introduction of racing elements to certain levels. Continuing the ludicrous story from the original game, Battlemaniacs sees the 'toads sucked into an arcade machine and setting out to rescue kidnapped ladies.
